For instance, pagination and numbering has come unstuck on the longer comment threads. For no… [+6544 chars]

articles.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC/USD continues to push higher toward $14,000
articles.description: After climbing to its highest level since June 2019 at $13,863 on Wednesday, Bitcoin staged a technical correction and closed the day nearly 4% lower.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin rises for the third straight day on Saturday.
  • RSI indicator on the daily chart continues to float above 70.

articles.author: Cointelegraph By Joseph Young
articles.title: Why Bitcoin price and volume rising together is bad news for Ethereum, altseason
articles.description: Bitcoin broke out of the $13,000 resistance level merely a week ago, which means those expecting Ethereum and altcoin prices to rise may have to wait a few months.
articles.content: Bitcoin (BTC) is sucking up the volume from the entire cryptocurrency market as it continues to rally. This is causing the alternative cryptocurrency (altcoin) market to pullback, which has seen risi… [+3555 chars]

articles.title: Ethereum price ascending channel breakout possible if Bitcoin consolidates
articles.description: Consolidation from Bitcoin would allow Ethereum to double bottom in its BTC pair and possibly breakout from the ascending channel in its USDT pair.
articles.content:
